meanings.definition: A person who plays the cornet.
meanings.sent1: The talented cornetists performed a beautiful melody.
meanings.sent2: The cornetists in the band played with passion and skill.
meanings.sent3: The cornetists decided to have a friendly competition to see who could play the highest note.
meanings.sent4: Among the musicians, the cornetists shone like bright stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the cornetists echoed through the concert hall, captivating the audience.

meanings.sent1: We could hear the cornetists practicing together in harmony.
meanings.sent2: The concert featured many talented cornetists from different countries.
meanings.sent3: The group of cornetists formed a circle and played a cheerful tune.
meanings.sent4: In the orchestra, the cornetists added a unique flair to the music.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the cornetists blended beautifully with the other instruments, creating a magical atmosphere.
